channel.title: Is app ID "362890" the same as Dedicated server that ships with game.
channel.description:
Hello, Is the dedicated server that ships with the game (srcds) the same as the one you would download via Steam cmd app ID "362890"?
The Steam cmd seems to require steam id and password to d/l and i would rather not do that. if its the same then np.
c:/steamcmd/steamcmd.exe +login anonymous +force_install_dir c:/bms_ded +app_update 362890 validate +quit pause
returns "no subscription" error Thanks

item.title: Is app ID "362890" the same as Dedicated server that ships with game.
item.description:
Ah-ha Thanks i followed this post and did not look at the top of page it is for the game itself.

SOLVED: Can I set up a dedicated BM server via steampipe?

Read full topic
item.source: Is app ID "362890" the same as Dedicated server that ships with game.

item.title: Is app ID "362890" the same as Dedicated server that ships with game.
item.dc:creator: Smeegel
item.description:
The app ID I used for a Black Mesa server was 346680 which allowed me to download anonymously.

Read full topic

item.title: Is app ID "362890" the same as Dedicated server that ships with game.
item.description:
Hello,
Is the dedicated server that ships with the game (srcds) the same as the one you would download via Steam cmd app ID “362890”?

The Steam cmd seems to require steam id and password to d/l and i would rather not do that. if its the same then np.

c:/steamcmd/steamcmd.exe +login anonymous +force_install_dir c:/bms_ded +app_update 362890 validate +quit
pause

returns “no subscription” error Thanks
